summary: 升级指定云数据库SelectDB版实例的数据库版本。

schema.description: 升级方式。不填写代表立即升级，填写1代表在可维护的时间段升级。

400.errorMessage: The conversion has been failed, exceed file size limit.
User not authorized to operate on the specified resource, or this API does not support RAM.
The specified database name is not allowed.

403.errorMessage: The requested operation can not be performed while the cluster is not sale.
Current DB instance state does not support this operation.
The instance engine and type does not support operations.
The specified instance state does't support this operation.
The operation is not permitted due to count of database or account privilege.
The resource is out of usage.

404.errorMessage: The DBInstanceId provided does not exist in our records.
The current instance lock mode does not support this operation.
The specified parameter VSwitchId is not valid.
Specified api is not found, please check your url and method.
The specified instance is not found.
The specified instance classic does not exist.
The provided RegionId does not exist in our records.
The inquiry failed. Contact Alibaba Cloud customer service representatives.

title: 升级数据库版本
